outputs.output_descr: This project is an integral part of the People-centered Development Program (PDP), which is UNDP development programme for Papua intended to strengthen the capacity of local governement institutions and civil society organisations in achieving MDGs.  Thi

The People-centered Development Programme entails a range of activities  aimed at strengthening the capacities of key agencies working on the MDGs in Papua and increasing public access to basic social services.

The project name has been changed from "Papua Development Programme" to "People-Centered Development Programme" to better reflect the aim of the project, which is to strengthen the Government and Civil Society capacities to achieve the MDGs.
